attributes.action: ensure Equal opportunities for all at Network Rail
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The tax payer deserves to know why there is no effective Equal opportunities policy at Network Rail.

The White Management at Network Rail need to implement an Equal opportunities policy to deal with: age, disability, employment status, gender, health, marital status, trade union membership, nationality, race, religion, sexual preference, social class or any other irrelevant condition.
